English
In the near future, Indian born Deon Wilson (Dev Patel), is a high ranking
executive in a Robotic Police Force company. When he comes up with an idea
to make a self conscious robot named Chappie to protect better, his higher
ups disapprove it. Nonetheless, he makes it and when the company finds out,
scraps the robot. When 2 small time criminals planning a $200 million heist
find Chappie, they kidnap Deon and force him to program Chappie to assist
them in their heist. When power-corrupted military general Vincent
(Hugh Jackman) finds out, he rallies all forces to stop Chappie, at any cost
that leads to an monumental showdown between Good and Evil.
